entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
